name: Magic Academy (TeachTower)
description:
An innovative 3D Minecraft-like educational environment designed to gamify the learning experience for students. Visualizes a student's skill stack as interactive blocks in a virtual tower, where each block represents a skill or concept the student has learned or is mastering.

Built with Unity as a multiplayer 3D game integrating with the CoachBot Platform for curriculum management and AI-generated educational content. Featured gameplay modules including combat, pets, avatar customization, multiplayer interactions, and in-app purchases.

The game allowed players to earn diamonds by completing challenges and MCQs, redeem them for real-world prizes, and included premium membership features. Project was discontinued before launch despite significant technical development.
